name: Tommy's Drawing Adventure
description:
A long time ago, a people named "Purth" lived on earth. But one day, a magic Daemon named BigMom divided the people in two : Bluth and Reth.
A little ghost named Pipo decided to save Purth people and kill BigMom.

-Tommy !
-Yes dad ?
-stop drawing nonsense and go to bed
This game is inspired by Cuphead and Gonner, two awsome game

join the TRSgameserver on Discord : https://discord.gg/Tjk2f69
